Title: Relates to authorizing community colleges offering an associates degree program in nursing to offer a four-year bachelors degree program in nursing
Summary: Authorizes community colleges offering an associates degree program in nursing to offer a four-year bachelor degree program in nursing.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing community colleges offering an associates degree program in nursing to offer a four-year bachelors degree program in nursing
